pages.Query.layout
pages.Query.query_gen(dd_vals: List, q_var: List, q_in: List, q_op)

Handel all action in the Query Part of the GUI (Extend Change Reduce)

Parameters

  • dd_vals – All Varietals used in Query Section are chosen

  • q_var – the Dropdown of variable of Query Section

  • q_in – the Input for the Variables of Query Section

  • q_op – the Variabel who is selected for the Zoom

Returns

Updatet Varibel List and the Input.

pages.Query.evid_gen(dd_vals, e_var, e_in, e_op)

Handel all action in the Evidence Part of the GUI (Extend Change Reduce)

Parameters

  • dd_vals – All Varietals used in Evidence Section are chosen

  • e_var – the Dropdown of variable of Evidence Section

  • e_in – the Input for the Variables of Evidence Section

  • q_op – the Variabel who is selected for the Zoom

Returns

Updatet Varibel List and the Input.

pages.Query.query_router(q_dd, e_dd, b_q, b_e, op_s, q_var, q_in, e_var, e_in, q_op, e_op, op_i)

Receives app callback events and manages/redirects these to the correct functions.

Parameters

  • q_dd – Query Varibels Names

  • e_dd – Evidence Variable Names

  • b_q – Trigger if the Zoom Button in the Query is Pressed

  • b_e – Trigger if the Zoom Button in the Evidence is Pressed

  • op_s – Trigger if the Modal parameter from a Zoom should be saved

  • q_var – Div of the Query Variable

  • q_in – Div or the Input of Query

  • e_var – Div of the Evidence Variable

  • e_in – Div or the Input of Evidence

  • q_op – Information of whiche Zoom Button was pressed in the Query section

  • e_op – Information of whiche Zoom Button was pressed in the Evidence section

  • op_i – The Values choosen in the Zoom Modal

Returns

Query Varibels, Query Input, Evidence Variable, Evidence Input, Text Prefix.

pages.Query.modal_router(op, op_i, m_bod, dd_e, dd_q)

Recessive all App Calls that are change the Modal for the zoom Function

Parameters

  • op – Trigger to add More Input Option by Numeric Variabel

  • op_i – Trigger to update Chance for the Chosen values

  • m_bod – The State of the Modal

  • dd_e – div withe the chosen values in the Evidence Section

  • dd_q – div withe the chosen values in the Query Section

Returns

update Modal Body for the Zoom

pages.Query.infer(n1, q_var, q_in, e_var, e_in)

Calculates withe Jpt the Probilty of query and evidence

Parameters

  • n1 – Button to trigger the Calculation

  • q_var – Div of the Query Variable

  • q_in – Div or the Input of Query

  • e_var – Div of the Evidence Variable

  • e_in – Div or the Input of Evidence

Returns

Probability as String
